original_title: Visions of War: Hitler in His Own Words
overview: Released as a separate volume of the Visions of War series, this two-part biographical miniseries outlines the events that shaped Adolf Hitler's life, tracing his journey from misguided Austrian youth to leader of Nazi Germany. The program also examines Hitler's suicide -- committed in a Berlin bunker alongside his longtime mistress, Eva Braun -- toward the end of World War II. Bonus material includes the documentary "Artillery: God of War."
title: Visions of War: Hitler in His Own Words
